titleStmt.title: The proceedings of the home-circuit on the King's commission of the Crown side, at the several assizes, (viz.) Hartford, Brentwood, Croydon, East-Grensted, and Rochester. Being a goal delivery held for the several counties, &c. And in the fourth year of his Majesties reign. With allowance.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and sold by George Croom, at the Blue-Ball in Thames-street, near Baynard's-Castle,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Blue-Ball in Thames-street, near Baynard's-Castle
